title: First post
content:
This is the first post of my personal blog (for test).

  • using hexo with ‘inside‘ theme
    • deploy to Github pages
      • personal domain (github user pages)
      • hexo git deploy plugin
    • theme setting:
      • comments module
      • avatar profile photo -> wordpress
        • univeral email account
      • google analytics

References:

  • How to use Hexo and deploy to GitHub Pages
  • Github Pages
  • hexo docs
